example.text: There is an unprecedented crisis on the southern border that will only get worse once Title 42 is lifted. Rep. Gallagher explains why this is so frustrating and calls out the Biden administration for lacking the will to solve this crisis. [[url]]

Chase is a student at West De Pere High School and a great advocate for improving financial literacy curriculum in schools. Rep. Gallagher talked with him this week about why financial literacy matters and how we can help teach more NEW students this important life skill. [[url]]

Since coming into office, the Biden administration has pushed open border policies that have created an unprecedented crisis on the southern border. Rep. Gallagher explains how the Secure the Border Act would fix these problems and help end the chaos at the border. [[url]]
